definition: the back/the reverse side/the wrong side
the back of a body or object/to turn one's back/to hide something from/to learn by heart/to recite from memory/unlucky (slang)/hard of hearing
to be burdened/to carry on the back or shoulder
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: Simultaneously, the SP aluminum thick film layer is the rear electrode.
sentences.chinese: 同時，鋁漿厚膜燒結層又作爲背面電極。

sentences.english: And behind it is the rainy-weather stage.
sentences.chinese: 而雨臺呢則在它的背面。

sentences.english: Draw an ellipse on the box.
sentences.chinese: 在盒蓋的背面畫一個橢圓。

sentences.english: We agree to abide by the condition printed on the back of this form.
sentences.chinese: 我們同意遵守印於本表背面的規則。

sentences.english: It was prettily engraved with flowers on the back.
sentences.chinese: 此件雕刻精美，背面有花飾圖案。

sentences.english: The larger rear block plays on a composition of projecting and recessed balconies.
sentences.chinese: 較大的背面區塊上組成了陽臺凹凸有致的聯合演繹。

sentences.english: Abaxial surface of calyx with needle-like prickles.
sentences.chinese: 背面花萼具針葉象一樣皮刺。

sentences.english: Sturdy front and back pull-on tabs.
sentences.chinese: 堅固的正面和背面拉選項卡上。

sentences.english: Lower limbs is inflectional several, knead with big toe by sufficient the reverse side the number between each foot second.
sentences.chinese: 下肢屈曲數次，並用拇指揉按足背面各趾間數次。

sentences.english: Your claim check is stapled in the back of your ticket jacket .
sentences.chinese: 你的認領單釘在票封的背面。

sentences.english: This is accomplished by pressing the balls together from the back of the rack toward the apex ball.
sentences.chinese: 藉由從向頂球的架背面一起壓迫球這是完成的。

sentences.english: In the case of a data input mode, the brightness of the backlighting is reduced.
sentences.chinese: 在數據輸入模式情況下，減小背面光照明的亮度。

sentences.english: It is a classic example of how not to design a new city centre.
sentences.chinese: 這對於設計新市中央是個最佳的背面課本。

sentences.english: Padded, reinforced and computer stitched back panel.
sentences.chinese: 補齊，鋼筋及電腦縫製背面板。

sentences.english: He gummed the back of stamps.
sentences.chinese: 他在郵票的背面塗上膠。

sentences.english: Its "wrong"side is smooth and shows the weave used.
sentences.chinese: 織物背面光滑無絨並顯現織紋。

definition: reverse side/backside/the other side (of a problem etc)/negative/bad
model or template character/written slogan or phrase/mention (e.g. "air mail" 航空 on a letter, "first draft" 初稿 on a document etc)
veined pattern/wrinkles/vein lines (in marble or fingerprint)/grain (in wood etc)
to fold the corner of a page/to dog-ear
